column4:
あいつらは、
ナイトシェイドです。

追跡していたつもりが、
逆にやられてしまいました。
column5: I was trying to hunt them down, but they had the same idea about me.
column11: I was trying to hunt them down, but they had the same idea about me.

column4: 車だと思って油断しました。
column5: I thought they were just cars, so I ignored them.
column11: I thought they were just cars so I ignored them.

column4:
車体ごとぶつかってくるのが、
敵の戦法です。
column5: But that was their strategy -- to use the cars to ram into me.
column11: But that was their strategy, to use the cars to ram into me.

column4:
高速で突っ込んでくる敵に
気をつけて。
column5: I should have been more careful about the cars coming at me at high speeds.
column11: I should have been more careful about the cars coming at me at high speeds.

column4:
/pさんも、
/c5車での体当たり/c3なら
応戦できるはずです。
column5: /p, you'll be able to confront them if you're /c5driving a car/c3.
column11: /p, if you're /c5driving a car/c3, you'll be able to confront them.

column4:
私のことは気にせず、
戦ってください。
column5: Please fight, and don't worry about me.
column11: Please don't worry about me, and fight.

column4:
敵車との正面衝突は避けて、
側面か後方を狙うんです。
column5: Avoid colliding with them head-on, and aim for their sides or back instead.
column11: Avoid colliding with them head-on, and aim for their sides or back instead.
